stream_context.summary: Kaze works on a new cut-scene in which a boss swallows Mario, transporting him to a battle arena after a brief dialogue with Bowser. The stream also includes tangents about a planned “Mr Beast-style” video hacking 25 N64 games.

development_findings.summary: Implemented a sequence where Mario talks to Bowser, exits to a suddenly empty area, and is then swallowed by a boss that spits him into the battle arena; current bug prevents the boss from being visible.
development_findings.quote: Right now what we're trying to do is we are making the cut scene where the boss eats Mario and spits you out at the scene where you fight them.

development_findings.summary: The area retains background music during dialogue, but the music cuts to silence once Mario steps outside to heighten suspense before the boss appears.
development_findings.quote: So right now when you're in here you still hear the music… but then when you go out… everyone’s gone, it’s quiet, you don’t know what’s happening and then this guy appears.

development_findings.summary: A new custom track is planned for Bowser’s office / pre-battle segment, indicating upcoming work for the composer.
development_findings.quote: The office should have some funky music—yeah it will definitely have a custom song.

context_findings.summary: Kaze intends to start next week’s stream 30 minutes early and end early due to attending a wedding.
context_findings.quote: I have a wedding to attend next week so I might actually start stream like half an hour early and I'm probably gonna have to cut it early too.

context_findings.summary: He is excited about creating a click-bait, fast-paced “I hacked every N64 game in one day” video inspired by Mr Beast.
context_findings.quote: It will be the ultimate Mr Beast N64 hacking video.

context_findings.summary: Frustration arises when the stream is briefly suspended for policy violations after playing an Evangelion song.
context_findings.quote: Stream suspended for policy violations—what? That is very not good.

badub.summary: Will need to compose a ‘funky’ custom track for the Bowser office cut-scene, as requested by Kaze.

zeina.summary: Assists Kaze with replacing malfunctioning speakers during the stream, showing casual on-stream collaboration.

key_stories.title: Building the boss intro cut-scene
key_stories.summary: Kaze designs and scripts a dramatic sequence: Mario meets Bowser, exits to silence, and is swallowed by a boss that transports him to the arena. A display bug currently hides the boss.
key_stories.challenge: Create a memorable, story-driven transition into the boss fight.
key_stories.process: Scripted dialogue, adjusted music states, and programmed the swallowing mechanic. Tested live on stream.
key_stories.outcome: Core flow works, but the boss model fails to render, requiring further debugging.
key_stories.key_quote: It's a work in progress—this guy appears… oh god you can't even see him.

key_stories.title: Stream halted by copyright flag
key_stories.summary: Playing an Evangelion track triggered YouTube’s policy system, instantly suspending the livestream.
key_stories.process: Kaze monitors the warning and waits for auto-restart, contemplating a manual restart if needed.
key_stories.outcome: Stream pauses temporarily; Kaze notes the risk for future streams.
